Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Rivoli, you'll be centrally located in Sorrento, steps from Basilica di Sant'Antonio and Chiesa di San Francesco. This hotel is within close proximity of Piazza Sant'Antonino and Tasso Theatre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 11 AM
